meanings.sent1: The inviscid liquid flowed effortlessly down the slope.
meanings.sent2: The water in the stream was so inviscid that it moved quickly.
meanings.sent3: The inviscid syrup poured out of the bottle like magic.
meanings.sent4: Her inviscid words slipped through the air without leaving a trace.
meanings.sent5: The inviscid nature of the oil made it hard to contain in the container.

meanings.sent1: The inviscid substance spread thinly over the surface.
meanings.sent2: The paint was too inviscid, causing it to drip off the canvas.
meanings.sent3: The inviscid glue refused to stick anything together.
meanings.sent4: His inviscid ideas flowed freely but lacked depth.
meanings.sent5: The inviscid slime slipped through her fingers like water.
